meanings.definition: A type of explosive consisting of nitroglycerine and nitrocellulose mixed with a stabilizer
meanings.sent1: The miners used gelignite to blast through the rock and reach the precious minerals.
meanings.sent2: The gelignite exploded with a loud bang, sending debris flying everywhere.
meanings.sent3: When the gelignite heard it was going to be used, it got so nervous it started shaking!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like gelignite, exploding joy into the room.
meanings.sent5: The gelignite's power was unmatched, shattering everything in its path.

meanings.definition: To explode or destroy with gelignite
meanings.sent1: The construction crew decided to gelignite the old building to make space for the new one.
meanings.sent2: He carefully placed the gelignite around the target, ready to detonate it.
meanings.sent3: The gelignite was feeling rebellious and refused to explode on command!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like gelignite, destroying his confidence in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The gelignite erupted with such force, it shook the entire neighborhood.
